subject: Coaches and Managers
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Replacing John Anderson, Craig Ramsay is the fifth coach in Atlanta Thrashers history. Ramsay, 59, was an assistant with the Boston Bruins from 2007 to 2010.
snippet: Replacing John Anderson, Craig Ramsay is the fifth coach in Atlanta Thrashers history. Ramsay, 59, was an assistant with the Boston Bruins from 2007 to 2010.
